meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>closed</kanji> <kanji>chain</kanji> lets everyone know that a building or store is <vocabulary>closing</vocabulary> for good. It's got to <vocabulary>lockout</vocabulary> everyone so they won't try to get in anymore.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
